name: Grill Dome’s Demonstration Chicken
keywords: appetizer, chicken drumsticks, mango powder, spices, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons mango powder or finely grated orange zest

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, stir together the salt, pepper, chili powder, cayenne, ginger, garlic powder, sugar and mango powder or orange zest. Add the drumsticks and rub the spice mix evenly into the chicken.
Add the Worcestershire sauce, vinegar and cream and toss to coat. Set aside for 30 minutes.

Heat hardwood lump charcoal in a grill with a lid until the temperature gauge holds at 350 or the coals are evenly gray. Place the drumsticks on the grill, and close the lid. Cook, turning the wings every 6 or 7 minutes, until done, 15 to 30 minutes.
